headline: KLA Stock Eyes Buy Point After Surge Of Nearly 40% This Year
summary: KLA Corp. shares are nearing a buy point as they pierce through a lengthy consolidation period, and there are signs the stock is drawing in more mutual-fund investment. Those developments have thrust the chip equipment maker into this week's spotlight of Big Cap 20 stocks from Investor's Business Daily.
